text:
Sure, I'd be happy to help you summarize the text! Here's a summary of the conversation between Ollie and Jane:
Ollie: Hi Jane, are you in Warsaw?
Jane: Yes, just back! Are you free for dinner on the 19th?
Ollie: No, I'm not free on either the 18th or 19th.
Jane: Oh right, I lost my calendar. Thanks for reminding me!
Ollie: We can have lunch this week?
Jane: Sure, Friday works for me.
Jane: What do you mean "we don't have any more whisky"?
Ollie: Oh, I must have misread something. Don't worry about it!
Jane: Haha, okay! Don't forget to bring some sun on Friday.
Ollie: Looking forward to it!
Jane: Sorry, I'm busy and won't be able to make it for lunch tomorrow. Maybe at 6pm after your courses?
Ollie: Okay, tea is ready! Did you bring the pastries?
Jane: I already ate them all. See you in a minute!</s><s> The 10 Best Books on the History of Sci
